sr.te: TPanel is a free touch panel compatible to a G4 panel of AMX. It works together with any NetLinx and supports even some G5 commands. TPanel is available for Android 11 and newer, as well as iPhone and iPad with IOS 16.1.2 or newer. It is also available for Linux and Mac. The source is free and can be downloaded from https://www.github.com/TheLord45/tpanel
